column2: HR208 - Beautiful House for Rent in Gamsabha Junction
column6: Welcoming ambience and the attractive structure of this house makes it an ideal investment for someone looking for a family home in a serene neighborhood. Despite situated in walking distance to high-level road and number of amenities, the property boasts of a calm and quite environment with a beautiful back and front gardens and a rooftop. The interior is well lit with natural lighting and there is good ventilation throughout the house making the house feel very open and airy. The house is built on 10 perches and comes with two living areas, 3 large bedrooms with one en suite bedroom, two smaller rooms, dining room, hot and cold kitchens. Master bedroom is air-conditioned and the two smaller rooms have been used as a gym and study. The cold kitchen is finished with wooden pantry cupboards and there is a separate kitchen for hot cooking. There are balconies around the rooms, a larger balcony adjoining the second floor living room and the rooftop terrace is perfect for small functions or an evening hangout.
